text: Harry Halbreich (February 9, 1931, Berlin - June 27, 2016, Uccle) was a Belgian musicologist of (partly) Jewish descent.Dust jacket biography of Harry Halbreich from Halbreich (2007). He was known for a number of books, articles and studies on modern and contemporary music, including monograph works on Olivier Messiaen, Claude Debussy, Arthur Honegger and Bohuslav Martin≈Ø. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Belgian musicians Category:Belgian writers Category:Belgian academics Category:Musicologists Category:Writers from Berlin
title: Harry Halbreich
